name: Once upon a time, no, one day!
name_original: Once upon a time, no, one day!
description:
This is the project of the 4th module of the Saga school course with other elements more, an adventure of a common guy, with a common weapon, in a common place and facing enemies... you know

(Note: even with mobile game elements, there is no portability to cell phones, only for Windows X64)

W/A/S/D-Move

F-Attack

Q-Open box

Spece-Attack Special

P-Pause
